basic.description:
Statistical methods as used in economics. This course introduces statistical hypothesis testing and covers basic methods as far as linear regression analysis.
NOTE    A grade of C in this course is required as a prerequisite for ECON 351/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;12I;72P)
basic.subject: ECON
basic.title: Introduction to Statistics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   ECON110 or (ECON111 & 112)
Corequisite  MATH120 or 121 or 122 or (MATH123 & MATH124) or 126 or APSC172.
Exclusion No more than 3.0 units from STAT261; STAT263; STAT267; STAT367; COMM162; ECON250; PSYC202; SOCY211; BIOL243; CHEE209
